p:
MMF had antiviral activity for influenza A(H1N1), A(H3N2), A(H7N9), and B viruses in many in vitro studies.
27 The effect of MMF on influenza virus was through the inhibition of viral messenger RNA and protein expression by inhibiting the cellular IMPDH. Besides, MMF markedly reduced viral loads in lungs and all mice survived.
94
